395f24c6-4807-4a63-a02a-b7c39fb59930.description: Strength is one of two abilities in PROTéGé. It represents a character's physical attributes such as raw power, toughness, and agility. Strength determines how often a character can attack, how much damage they deal, and the likeliness of striking a hit. Strength affects how much damage a character can take before falling unconscious.
395f24c6-4807-4a63-a02a-b7c39fb59930.name: Strength

f9d08adf-4d15-4644-adaa-b607d77c3af1.description: Intelligence is the second ability in PROTéGé. It determines a wide variety of mental characteristics such as spatial reasoning, critical thinking abilities, memory, and learning capacity. Intelligence governs how many skill points a character has, the maximum level of spell a character can learn, the effectiveness of character spells, how much mana a character has, and how many spells per day the character can cast.
f9d08adf-4d15-4644-adaa-b607d77c3af1.name: Intelligence

70912de6-57b4-47c5-8c00-448aa0a9bcc1.description: Stealth helps you hide from other characters, meaning they cannot target you.
70912de6-57b4-47c5-8c00-448aa0a9bcc1.name: Stealth

acd7980d-316b-4309-8074-0afa77062fe6.description: Perception lets you see and hear things.
acd7980d-316b-4309-8074-0afa77062fe6.name: Perception
